headline: Chelsea Women beat Real Madrid in their Champions League opener
summary: Chelsea defeated Real Madrid 3-2 at Stamford Bridge as the UEFA Women’s Champions League group stage got underway. Group A: Lyon 3-0 Galatasaray, Roma 1-0 Wolfsburg Group B: Chelsea 3-2 Real Madrid, Celtic 0-2 FC […]

headline: Everton Women draw at Arsenal, first WSL win for Crystal Palace
summary: Everton held Arsenal to a 0-0 draw in the Barclays Women’s Super League watched by over 25,000 at the Emirates Stadium. Manchester City 2-0 West Ham United Arsenal 0-0 Everton Tottenham Hotspur 2-3 Liverpool Leicester […]

headline: Brighton Women beat Aston Villa after both teams see red
summary: Brighton & Hove Albion beat Aston Villa 4-2 after both teams saw red in Saturday’s Barclays Women’s Super League match. Rachel Daly did have the visitors ahead from a Kirsty Hanson cross, only for Nikita […]

headline: Barclays Women’s Super League leadership up for grabs
summary: A new Barclays Women’s Super League leader is likely, with several teams having the opportunity to overtake the top two whose game has been postponed. Chelsea’s match with Manchester United is off due to the […]

headline: London City and Sunderland win away in FA Women’s League Cup
summary: London City Lionesses and Sunderland both began their FA Women’s League Cup group stage games with away wins on Thursday evening. London City Lionesses struck late on against Southampton to take the points in Group […]

headline: Newcastle take Everton to penalties in Women’s League Cup
summary: Newcastle United’s debut in the FA Women’s League Cup group stage saw them take a point against Everton, who bagged a second one from winning the shoot-out. Demi Stokes scored just five minutes in for […]

headline: Three narrow wins and two late levellers in the WSL
summary: There were narrow wins in the Barclays Women’s Super League for Arsenal, Manchester City and Manchester United, plus late levellers by Spurs and West Ham. Manchester City 1-0 Brighton & Hove Albion Everton 0-1 Manchester […]

headline: Chelsea Women sink Crystal Palace 7-0 at Selhurst Park
summary: Chelsea made it two wins from two games with a 7-0 victory at Crystal Palace in the Barclays Women’s Super League. Lauren James had the ball in the Palace net but the whistle had gone […]

headline: Crystal Palace Women make home WSL debut against Chelsea
summary: Chelsea again kick off the weekend’s Barclays Women’s Super League action, this time away to newcomers Crystal Palace at Selhurst Park. The Eagles’ Katie Stengel featured for Liverpool when they defeated Chelsea 2-1 at the […]

headline: Miedema scores as Manchester City Women draw at Arsenal
summary: Barclays Women’s Super League draws for Arsenal and Man City, Liverpool and Leicester, while Spurs put four goals past newcomers Crystal Palace. Moments after Miedema almost caught Manuela Zinsberger off her line, Frida Maanum fired […]
